function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of RNA and DNA viruses","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of antiviral materials and technology","Technologies":"Antiviral composites, graphene-derivatives","People":"Individuals in proximity to the contaminated environment","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective antiviral composites","Impact":"Failure to mitigate viral spread","Mitigation":"Regular testing and verification of antiviral activity","Technologies":"Laboratory assays, viral culture techniques","People":"Research institutions, manufacturers of antiviral composites","Owner":"Research institutions, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Dependence on concentration and exposure time","Impact":"Inconsistent antiviral effectiveness","Mitigation":"Optimizing concentration and exposure protocols","Technologies":"Dosing systems, time-controlled application methods","People":"Facility managers, researchers","Owner":"Facility managers, research institutions"}]}
